author: alefisico
body:
#### PR description:

- This PR includes the PuppiMET collection with the new PUPPIv15 as mentioned in this [PR review](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30922/files#r490862851) for nanoAOD.
- Additionally updates the training for PUID to UL17.

#### PR validation:

This PR succesfully passed the usual `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`.

Once this PR is merged, we need a backport to 10_6_X for nanoAODv8.
title: PuppiMET with PUPPIv15 and UL17 PUID
